name: Crotts Aircraft Service, Inc.
about: Crotts Aircraft Service, Inc. is a premier flight training institution based at the Dodge City Regional Airport and Hays Regional Airport in Kansas. We offer a comprehensive range of aviation training programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our training includes intense instruction in commercial maneuvers using complex aircraft, ensuring students are well-prepared for their careers. With full-service Fixed Based Operations (FBO) facilities, we provide a streamlined and supportive environment for all our students. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities make Crotts Aircraft Service an ideal choice for aspiring pilots looking to achieve their aviation goals. We are committed to delivering high-quality training and exceptional service to every student.
services:

Intro Flight
